name: deepl-translator-cli
description: This module provides command line translation capabilities and is powered by DeepL (https://www.deepl.com/translator)
author: Vladimir Setka <vsetka@gmail.com>

scripts.release:major: generate-changelog -u https://github.com/vsetka/deepl-translator-cli -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && yarn version --new-version major && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: generate-changelog -u https://github.com/vsetka/deepl-translator-cli -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && yarn version --new-version minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:patch: generate-changelog -u https://github.com/vsetka/deepl-translator-cli -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && yarn version --new-version patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags
